subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Golden State’s Stephen Curry, a streaky point guard, dropped 54 points on the Knicks, making 11 of 13 3-pointers, in a performance that will go down in N.B.A. history.
snippet: Golden State’s Stephen Curry, a streaky point guard, dropped 54 points on the Knicks, making 11 of 13 3-pointers, in a performance that will go down in N.B.A. history.
